title: Ticket #3644: find correct location for files differing between condor rpm versions
description:
Between the UW/OSG/Fedora versions of the condor RPM, there are some files that do not get installed in the same locations; condor_config.local comes to mind, there may be others.

Find out what all paths differ between the versions, and decide on the correct location for it. Also, find out which ones are likely to cause trouble if they change. For example, the location of condor_config.local changing may surprise people or break things, but other things that the user does not touch may not cause any trouble to update.
remarks:
2013-Aug-19 07:39:01 by edquist:
The main unresolved item here was what to do with the (bosco related) campus_factory files: 

  campus_factory.conf:
    osg:          /etc/condor/
    uw:           /usr/libexec/condor/campus_factory/etc/


  condor_mapfile:
    osg:          /usr/share/condor/campus_factory/condor/
    uw:           /usr/libexec/condor/campus_factory/share/condor/

I am planning to keep the bosco stuff in the osg location, barring objections from FW. I'll also have Derek W weigh in on this.

2013-Aug-22 11:35:16 by edquist:
Derek said the OSG locations look fine for the bosco stuff, although campus factory probably won't work in the rpm until he makes some changes.

We'll be using the OSG locations for all the mentioned files except condor_config.local; for that one we'll use /etc/condor/ as in the UW rpm.
